Contributing¶

We welcome contributions!

Docstring Format¶

Use Google-style docstrings:

def function_name(param1, param2):
    """
    Brief description.

    Args:
        param1 (type): Description
        param2 (type): Description

    Returns:
        type: Description

    Examples:
        >>> function_name(1, 2)
        3
    """

Building Documentation¶

cd docs
.\make.bat html
